div.p: You use the Quick Create method to quickly create a virtual machine. When you create this virtual machine, you are only required to provide a few bits of information before you proceed. The template you select provides the rest of the configuration information.
To create a virtual machine using Quick Create, on the command bar, click New, click Virtual Machines and then click Quick Create.

After you enter a name for the virtual machine, select the virtual machine template you want, provide a password for the Administrator account on the virtual machine and then click Create A Virtual Machine.
